list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: add database configuration and migration files
feat: add password reset functionality to user model

task.summary: Default task
chore: add JetBrains IDE workspace configuration file
chore: add .gitignore file with common exclusions
chore: Add HTTP request response snapshot for dashboard access
feat: add auth controller with register, login, and logout functionality

feat: add auth middleware with JWT verification and user handling
Add protect middleware for route authentication and addUserToLocals for template access

feat: add auth middleware and routes for user authentication
Add auth middleware with protect and addUserToLocals functions Add auth routes for register, login, and logout operations

feat: add dashboard view with user greeting and protected content
Added new dashboard.ejs template displaying welcome message and user details

feat: add dashboard view for authenticated users
The commit adds a new dashboard.ejs view that displays user information and welcome
message for logged-in users. The view includes header and footer partials and showsfe protected content.at: add footer partial with closing HTML tags
feat: add header and footer partials for views

feat: add header partial with auth navigation
Add header.ejs template with conditional navigation links for authenticated users. Includes login/logout functionality and basic page structure.
chore: add HTTP request log for auth login endpoint

feat: add HTTP request log and home page template
chore: include new files for development environment and views

feat: add index and login EJS templates
Add initial view templates for home page and login form, including partial includes for header and footer.

feat: add initial User table migration
Added User table with id, name, email, password, createdAt, and updatedAt fields. Includes unique email constraint and primary key.
chore: add prisma migration lock file for mysql
chore: add initial package.json with project dependencies

page controller with basic route handlers
Added controller functions for home, login, register, and dashboard pagesfeat: add page controller
feat: add page routes with auth middleware and protected dashboard route
feat: add register view template with form and error handling
Generating commit message...

feat: add initial Prisma schema and Express server setup
Add User model to Prisma schema and configure basic Express server with auth routes
test: add HTTP test file for auth login endpoint

chore: add VCS configuration file for IntelliJ IDEA
The file configures Git as the version control system for the project.
initial commit
docs: Add comprehensive README.md for express-auth-js project
docs: Fix indentation in project structure section of README.md

feat: add password reset functionality with email verification
Add forgotPassword and resetPassword controller functions with token generation, validation, and email sending. Includes security measures like token hashing, expiry, and user enumeration protection.

feat: add password reset endpoints to auth routes
Added forgot-password and reset-password endpoints to authRoutes.js

feat: add forgot password view template
Added new EJS template for forgot password functionality with email input form, error/success message display, and header/footer includes.
feat: add forgot password link to login page
chore: add nodemailer dependency to package.json
chore: add nodemailer dependency to package-lock.json

feat: add password reset functionality to page controller
Added getForgotPasswordPage and getResetPasswordPage handlers with token validation. Integrated Prisma for database operations and crypto for token hashing.

feat: add forgot and reset password routes to pageRoutes
Add getForgotPasswordPage and getResetPasswordPage routes with redirectIfAuthenticated middleware

feat: add reset password view template
Add reset-password.ejs template for password reset functionality, including form fields for new password and confirmation.

feat: add password reset fields to User model
Added passwordResetToken and passwordResetTokenExpires fields to support password reset functionality.

feat: add email sending utility with nodemailer
Add new sendEmail utility function for sending emails using nodemailer with configurable options via environment variables.

feat: Add password reset functionality
Added new email utility, views, and updated auth controllers/routes to support password reset flow. Modified schema and package dependencies accordingly.

chore: add database configuration and migration files
feat: add password reset functionality to user model
